name: node-es6
description: Node.js ES6 starting seed. This is using Yarn as dependency manager, modules as body-parser and node-helmet, and some other common useful features as 404 and 500 generic request handlers.
author: Franco Rabaglia <francoo.hd@gmail.com>

scripts.dev: nodemon --exec "npm run lint && npm start" --ignore public/js --ignore public/javascript --ignore public/javascripts
